extension.summary: Patch Kodi skins (Estuary, Estouchy, Confluence, Amber) for OzWeather Radar Support.
extension.description: This addon attempts to patch Kodi skins (currently Estuary, Estouchy, Confluence, Amber) - for OzWeather radar support. Skin folder must be writeable! (Creates a backup of of the original skin files first and this addon can also restore those if need be). By default patches only the actual weather page. For Estuary & Confluence, can also patch your VideoFullScreen file for weather/radar during playback when video info is displayed. Turn this on in the addon settings if you wish.
extension.news: 0.2.0 - Add support for xonfluence 0.1.9 - Tweaks based on feedback 0.1.7 - VideoFullScreen is always used to make the addon simpler - New buttons for Estuary 0.1.5 - Tweaks 0.1.4 - Add support for Amber 0.1.3 - Support for imminent OzWeather 2 release, with support for Confluence, Estuary, Estouchy
